Searching for the perfect gift for that adventurous foodie in your life? Something that‚Äôs fun for everyone and tantalizes the taste buds? Look no further than our gift cards! Newsletter

Reviews

Review by - Google

Cody B:

This place should go on your ‚ÄúTo do‚Äù list if you ever find yourself in North Charleston!!! The food was amazing. Plenty of options for vegans and alternative diet people. I love it! Vegetarian options: I‚Äôm a vegetarian myself. The menu was like walking into a candy shop. There were so many options. Brussel sprouts, corn, green onions, spinach and so much more.

Review by - Google

Kevin B:

The staff was so friendly and inviting, the food was prepared quickly and it's delicious! I got the brunch bowl (I subbed in goat cheese grits) and the it was jam packed with flavors, from savory bacon to sweet maple syrup...

Review by - Google

Sonia D:

I really enjoyed the Dirty Bird breakfast. I had fried pickles with it. My friend had the Park Circle and we tried the parmesan grits. They were really good. The biscuit was soft and delicious!

Review by - Google

Aubrey X:

Visiting this establishment and not partaking in one of the grit bowls is a sin. Intriguing flavors and hefty portions are the reasons I'd definitely return. The hospitality of the crew was the cherry on top.

Review by - Google

Angela V:

WOW - came in & sat at the bar area, ordered the park circle ''peaches & cream.'' Grits asked for extra crispy bacon ü•ì ‚úîÔ∏è, the biscuits were flaky w house homemade blueberry jam!...

Specials

Friday January 23rd

HAPPY HOUR EVERY FRIDAY & SATURDAY! 

DRINK SPECIALS: 
$5 Craft Draft Beers
